idea-plugin.description:
Support for MicroPython devices in PyCharm and IntelliJ.


Features:


  • Code completion and docs for some MicroPython-specific modules
  • Flash a Python file or directory to a device
  • Run REPL on a device

Currently the plugin supports ESP8266, Pyboard, Micro:bit and RPi Pico devices. Your feedback and contributions are welcome! See the project page on GitHub.
